name: Iron Skeleton
pages: Iron Skeletons, also known as the 'poor man's iron golem', are made by dark alchemists who infuse the bones with iron, making them much stronger, but very slow.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Medium$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Scarce$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Walks$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Slow$(br)$(l)Health$(): 50hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 6-10hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Overworld, Underworld
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Does not burn in sunlight.$(br)- Has increased armor (+10).
